{"id":971658303,"question_id":2787,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1686809800,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"39 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/971658303/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Movement of Robots","memory":"59.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int sumDistance(int[] nums, String s, int d) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        List<Long> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n\n            char ch = s.charAt(i);\n\n            if(ch=='R'){\n                list.add(nums[i]+(long)d);\n\n            }else{\n                list.add(nums[i]-(long)d);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int M = (int) 1e9+7;\n            \n        long ret=0;\n        \n        Collections.sort(list);\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len-1;i++){\n            \n            // long dis = (nums[i+1] - nums[i])%M;\n            // res = res%M + (dis%M * (i+1)%M * (len-i-1)%M)%M ;\n            // res %=M;\n            \n            \n            \n            long dis = (list.get(i+1)-list.get(i)) % M;\n            ret += dis * (i+1) % M * (len-1-i) % M;\n            ret %= M;\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        return (int)ret;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n//         long res =0;\n//         for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n//             for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++){\n//                 res = res + Math.abs(nums[i]-nums[j])%M;\n//                 res%=M;\n//             }\n//         }\n        \n        // return (int)res;\n        \n       \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"movement-of-robots","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
